title: An Act authorizing borrowing by cities and towns at zero percent from the Commonwealth for green energy sources

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Frost of Auburn, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3489) of Paul K. Frost for legislation to authorize cities and towns to borrow from the Commonwealth without interest for green energy programs for such municipalities.  Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

related_entities.name: committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/16/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 10/16/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:55 PM in A-1                                                                                                                   and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Reporting date extended to Wednesday, March 18, 2026
